roleset.name: removal of outer covering
roleset.note: HULL-V NOTES: Hand-corrected by Stacy.Automatically created based on framefiles: milk (10.7) (from hull.01-v)

role.descr: the thing that is having its outer covering removed

example.name: adjectival
example.text: The husks of hulled corncobs are used to wrap tamales.

example.name: With beneficiary and instrument
example.text: The male bird will hull the seeds for his consort with his bill.

example.name: all arguments
example.text: Mary hulled the thick, dry covering from the corn that John grew in his back yard.
example.arg: from the corn that John grew in his back yard.

roleset.name: attack and strike a ship
roleset.note: HULL-V NOTES: Framed by Stacy. Edited by Jena (from hull.02-v)

example.name: usual use
example.text: We had not killed or wounded anyone, although the enemy often hulled us.
